mapper.select: select d.DEPTNO, d.DEPTNAME as deptname, EMPNAME as manager, de.DEPTNAME as deptpidname from DEPARTMENT d LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE e on d.MANAGER = e.EMPNO Left OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT de on d.DEPTPID = de.DEPTNO where d.DEPTNO = #{deptNo}
mapper.insert: insert into department(deptno, deptname, deptpid) values(seq_department_no.nextval,#{deptname},#{deptpid, jdbcType=VARCHAR })
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF = 1 AND CONNECT_BY_ISCYCLE = 0 START WITH DEPTPID = 1000 CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR DEPTNO = DEPTPID
